intro: The ultimate cat-baker puzzle is served – fresh and purr-fectly sweet!
description:
Meet the fluffiest chef in town – a whiskered wonder who’s baking up a storm and needs YOU to pack up his pastry masterpieces! Sounds easy? Try cramming mountains of cupcakes, cakes, and fish-shaped treats into boxes that are waaay too small! Can your puzzle skills handle the sugar rush?

Why you’ll love it:

- 90+ brain-tickling bakery box levels!
- 29 drool-worthy treats to stack, squish, and squeeze in!
- Sweet tunes: chill lo-fi or jazzy café vibes!
- Art so cute it might make you meow.
- And of course – the pawsitively charming cat-baker!


Each box is a new paw-some puzzle that’ll twist your brain like a pretzel. Warning: side effects may include uncontrollable smiling and sudden pastry cravings!


Oh, and if you figure out how the cat didn’t eat everything before you showed up… tell us. We’re still investigating.

Get ready to puzzle, pack and purr. Just don’t eat all the pastries... yet.
